CustomField.formula:
IF( OR(
AND( ISBLANK(First_Response_Time__c),Age_hrs__c >= CMSLAResponseTimeReq_hrs__c),
AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "High"),ISPICKVAL(Priority, "Urgent")), OR( CMSLAResponseTimeReq_hrs__c < ((Recent_Response_Time__c - Recent_Inbound_Message__c)*24), (((Recent_Response_Time__c - Recent_Inbound_Message__c)*24)*-1)>CMSLAResponseTimeReq_hrs__c)),
CM_SLA_2_Hour__c = TRUE
), True ,False )
CustomField.label: CM SLA TEST2
